title: Children of Fury
description: Within a period of turmoil for the immortals Heron is born. A Fury like no other with a legacy for vengeance spanning for thousands of years. In England during the 1400's he meets a young woman named Aimee who has already met her soulmate. As their paths collide with catastrophic results a story of retribution spanning centuries and continents unfolds. Love can create comfort or even hatred, but can also be found where we expect it least......
author: Diane Major
